name: TradeLeague
description: SwiftUI-based social DeFi gaming app on Aptos

scripts.ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -project TradeLeague.xcodeproj -scheme TradeLeague -configuration Debug -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 16' build
scripts.ios-device: cd ios && xcodebuild -project TradeLeague.xcodeproj -scheme TradeLeague -configuration Release -destination generic/platform=iOS build
scripts.clean: cd ios && xcodebuild clean -project TradeLeague.xcodeproj -scheme TradeLeague
